sen.j: 矢田部良吉（やたべ りょうきち、嘉永4年9月19日 (旧暦)（1851年10月13日） - 1899年8月8日）は、日本の植物学者、詩人。
sen.e: Ryoukichi YATABE (Oct. 13, 1851 - Aug. 8, 1899) was a botanist and poet in Japan.
Ryokichi YATABE (Oct. 13, 1851 - Aug. 8, 1899) was a botanist and poet in Japan.
Ryokichi YATABE (October 13, 1851 - August 8, 1899) was a botanist and poet in Japan.
sen.cmt: 月をスペルアウトしました。

sen.e: He was born in Nirayama Izu province.
He was born in Nirayama Izu province.
He was born in Nirayama Izu province.

sen.j: 明治2年（1869年）開成学校教官、明治4年（1871年）アメリカ合衆国に渡り、翌年コーネル大学で植物学を学ぶ。
sen.e: He became an instructor at Kaisei School in 1869 and he studied botanies at Cornell University in the United States of America in 1871.
He became an instructor at Kaisei School in 1869 and went to the United States of America in 1871 to study botany at Cornell University.
He became an instructor at Kaisei School in 1869 and went to the United States of America in 1871 to study botany at Cornell University.

sen.j: 明治10年（1877年）東京大学初代植物学教授となる。
sen.e: He became the first professor in botany at Tokyo University in 1877.
He became the first professor in botany at Tokyo University in 1877.
He became the first professor in botany at Tokyo University in 1877.
He took an administrative leave.
He took an administrative leave in 1891.
He took an administrative leave in 1891.

sen.j: 外山正一、井上哲次郎とともに『新体詩抄』を上梓した。
sen.e: He published Shintaishi sho (poems in the new style) together with Shoichi TOYAMA and Tetsujiro INOUE.
He published "Shintaishi sho" (poems in the new style) together with Shoichi TOYAMA and Tetsujiro INOUE.
He published "Shintaishi sho" (poems in the new style) together with Shoichi TOYAMA and Tetsujiro INOUE.

sen.j: 東京植物学会を設立、ローマ字論者でもあった。
sen.e: He founded an academic society for botany and he was an advocate for Roman characters.
He founded "The Botanic Society of Tokyo" (present-day "The Botanic Society of Japan"), and he was an advocate for Roman characters.
He founded "The Botanic Society of Tokyo" (present-day "The Botanic Society of Japan"), and he was an advocate for Roman characters.

sen.j: 鎌倉市で遊泳中に溺死。
sen.e: He died from drowning in Kamakura.
He drowned when swimming in Kamakura.
He drowned when swimming in Kamakura.

sen.j: 新体詩抄 初編 丸屋善七 明治15年8月
